messages.content: i want to ask you what is the average height of a woman in lebanon

The average height of a woman in Lebanon is approximately 158-160 cm (around 5 feet 2 inches). This figure is based on general data from studies on global height averages. However, heights can vary due to factors like genetics, nutrition, and socioeconomic conditions. Specific or updated data from recent surveys might provide a more precise number.

The average height of a man in Lebanon is approximately 174-176 cm (around 5 feet 8.5 to 5 feet 9 inches). This estimate is based on general data from global height studies. As with women, individual heights can vary due to factors like genetics, nutrition, and lifestyle. More recent or localized surveys might offer a more precise figure.
what is the height of conor mecgregor in cm
Conor McGregor's height is approximately 175 cm (5 feet 9 inches).
Khabib Nurmagomedov's height is approximately 178 cm (5 feet 10 inches).
Daniel Cormier's height is approximately 180 cm (5 feet 11 inches).
